Candace Amber Owens Farmer (born April 29, 1989) is an American conservative commentator and political activist.[2][3][4][5] She is known for her pro-Trump activism that began around 2016 after being initially very critical of Trump and the Republican Party, and for her criticism of Black Lives Matter and of the Democratic Party.[6][7][8] She worked for the conservative advocacy group Turning Point USA between 2017 and 2019 as their communications director

Candace Amber Owens Farmer (born April 29, 1989) is an American conservative commentator and political activist.[2][3][4][5] She is known for her pro-Trump activism that began around 2016 after being initially very critical of Trump and the Republican Party, and for her criticism of Black Lives Matter and of the Democratic Party.[6][7][8] She worked for the conservative advocacy group Turning Point USA between 2017 and 2019 as their communications director
